Seven Springs Mountain Resort

In the Laurel Mountains of South-Central Pennsylvania lies the ski and mountain recreation country of the mid-atlantic. Since 1922, 7 Springs has been welcoming local skiers to enjoy the abundant snow, fresh air and fresh home-prepared meals from the people of Somerset County.
